page.title: 14LIFE STYLES 1
page.content: {FAMILY LIFE:} In our family one Saturday is just like another.I get up, take the cover from the budgie cage then get my cereal.Now the rest of the family are coming down .We children do the housework.Mum makes sure of that.I think mum plays a major part in keeping the house clean and tidy.Mum and dad go out to wash the car ready for going down town to get meat for Sunday dinner.I get Â£1.50 pocket money which has to do the whole week.I usually have mine spent by Sunday and then need more.Back from the town we get hamburgers,beans and chips.Next I go out on my bicycle with my friends.We all get money and go to a local shop and get sweets and then watch T.V.until supper time.Daddy and I get a curry and a portion of chips. Once the clock strikes 10 00p.m. we children go to bed.
